title: I Believe (Tata Young album)
text:
I Believe is the debut <a href="English%20language">English language</a> album by <a href="Thailand">Thai</a> singer <a href="Tata%20Young">Tata Young</a> and was debuted on 14 February 2004 in <a href="Singapore">Singapore</a> and was released on 25 February 2004 in <a href="Asia">Asia</a> . The album was a hit throughout <a href="Asia">Asia</a>, selling more than 1 million copies and being certified gold in <a href="India">India</a>. The album's lead single, "Sexy, Naughty, Bitchy" broke the top 10 on the <a href="Oricon">Oricon</a> charts in <a href="Japan">Japan</a> and was one of the most successful Asian singles of the year; "Sexy, Naughty, Bitchy" dominated the airwaves and charts throughout <a href="Southeast%20Asia">Southeast Asia</a> and India. The song, "I Believe", topped the charts in <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a> and was a major success throughout Southeast Asia whilst also reaching the top 20 throughout <a href="East%20Asia">East Asia</a>. Young promoted the album in <a href="Thailand">Thailand</a> and India in mid 2004.
The title track was used as the <a href="2007%20AFC%20Asian%20Cup">2007 AFC Asian Cup</a> theme song.
Track listing.
Note:
